text: Vintage Crop (1 March 1987 - 14 July 2014) was a Thoroughbred racehorse. In 1993, he won the Melbourne Cup, becoming the first non-Australian bred/trained horse to do so. Vintage Crop was bred in the United Kingdom but was trained in Ireland. Vintage Crop was retired to the Irish National Stud in Kildare, County Kildare. He died on 14 July 2014, aged 27. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Thoroughbred racehorses
title: Vintage Crop
